net.finmath.montecarlo.opencl.RandomVariableOpenCL.DevicePointerReference

  • Packages that use RandomVariableOpenCL.DevicePointerReference 
    Package Description
    net.finmath.montecarlo.opencl
    Provides OpenCL implementations of RandomVariable and RandomVariableFactory.

    • Uses of RandomVariableOpenCL.DevicePointerReference in net.finmath.montecarlo.opencl

      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static Map<WeakReference<RandomVariableOpenCL.DevicePointerReference>,​org.jocl.cl_mem> RandomVariableOpenCL.DeviceMemoryPool.vectorsInUseReferenceMap
      This map allow to recover the device pointer for a given WeakReference<DevicePointerReference>.
